Name: Bishoujo Battle Mahjong Solitaire
About the game: The Bishoujo girls from 'Rick G Earth' mobile military turn-based strategy game from Japan are here! And they want to go head to head in a battle of Mahjong Solitaire. ■Puzzle game 'Mahjong solitaire' Find pairs of Mahjong tiles to remove them from the board. Time will run out if you are too slow, or if you didn’t plan your moves ahead. Over 100 different tile layouts are available, with randomized patterns for endless replayability. ■Characters from “Rick G Earth' Popular characters from the mobile bishoujo strategy battle game “Rick G Earth'. A total of 10 girls are showcased. Every 3 rounds of play, you unlock a new costume that and more is revealed as you progress deeper into the game. ■Character Introductions Shizuka Sabae [Garrison Girl] One of the best spotters in a garrison filled with spotters. No one can escape from her gaze, as long as her glasses aren’t fogged up. Karin Kanazawa [Garrison Girl] Ordinary child in a normal garrison, she enjoys taking unusual actions because she is easily bored with the status quo. Tomoka Sendai [Garrison Girl] Usually full of love and gentle like a goddess: but can become extra scary when angry. Matsuri Hisai [Garrison Girl] Daughter of famous celebrity couple, she wears kimono even at home. AH-64D [Weapon Girl] Finest of the Apache Longbow, gorgeous and deadly. AH-64D (3ath.) [Weapon Girl] Member of the 3rd Antitank Helicopter Corps. Blond hair and pale skin girl. Type 10 tank (8tk.) [Weapon Girl] Latest addition to the 8th Tank Battalion of the Ground Self-Defense Force, she is a serious and elite trained rookie. Heavy tank No.80 Beleza [Magma Army] Gas turbine powered, this weapon requires a lot of food. Unlock 2 hidden characters
